Services > featureToggle

featureToggle

Using the feature toggle service, you can determine if a particular feature is switched on/off in the current build. The features toggle will search for the features.json file in the server to determine if the feature is enabled.
Include featureToggle as a dependency in your app module 

var module = angular.module('myModule', ['featureToggle']);
Use the feature toggle for determine if a feature is switched on: 

featureToggle.isEnabled('some-feature').then(function(toggleResult) {
    if (toggleResult == true) {
        // feature is enabled
    } else {
        // feature is disabled
    }
    ...
}
